name: Farzanegan Highschool (NODET), Tehran, Iran
description: National Organization for Development of Exceptional Talents (NODET) is an organization that recruits students for middle and highschools through a two-step set of exams. The organization is aimed to provide a unique educational environment for the exceptionally talented students.

projects.name: Junior Soccer Robots
projects.description: Built small-sized soccer robots with AVR microcontrollers in a group of 4 students.■ Programmed microcontrollers in C, using CodeVisionAVR C Compiler. ■ Captained the robotic team for over two years. ■ Participated in various robotic competitions, including international RoboCup2014.
